name: researchPoints
help_text: Time to research (14 points equal to 1 second in research facility without modules and upgrades)

name: keyTopic
help_text: Is it a key topic? Visual effect only

name: msgName
help_text: Message in Intelligence screen for tech; must be zero for minor techs

name: techCode
help_text: Zero if major tech, one if minor tech. Affects whether or not 'Major research completed' is played, and whether or not it appears in Intelligence

name: iconID
help_text: Key name for icon (key names is hardcoded in c++ code)

name: subgroupIconID
help_text: Lft research icon. key name for icon (key names is hardcoded in c++ code)

name: redComponents
help_text: Components that will became unavailable for build

name: redStructures
help_text: Structures that will became unavailable for build

name: requiredStructures
help_text: Structures that should be build before making research
